text: Latch is looking for an iOS manager to lead our mobile team! As a Latch iOS lead focused on connected devices, you will utilize Bluetooth Low Energy and other communication protocols to seamlessly link our hardware devices to our client apps and server software. You will refine and implement iOS APIs that allow higher level code to access communication functionality in a simple manner. These APIs are used to create features like simple device setup, automatic data synchronization, and real time device coordination experiences. This job is for Fulltime onsite employees in NYC. https://www.latch.com/careers/index.html?gh_jid=1034759
